text: Dom Anacleto Cordeiro Gon√ßalves de Oliveira (17 July 1946 - 18 September 2020) was a Portuguese Roman Catholic prelate. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1970. He was auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Lisbon from 2005 to 2010. He then was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Viana do Castelo, Portugal, from 2010 until his death. Oliveira died on 18 September 2020 in Lisbon from a car crash at the age of 74.Diocese of Viano do CasteloMorreu o bispo Anacleto Oliveira, natural de Leiria ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Portuguese Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Lisbon Category:Road accident deaths
title: Anacleto Oliveira
